name: JUST CROSS
description:
You're Cluckston, the chicken.

Your goal:

Journey through the kingdom of Mazen, through its sewers, volcanic lands, trippy spaces, and treacherous caves all while dealing with your sporadic "friends".

Seems easy enough.

The road lies at the end of your journey... will you cross it?

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Controls: arrow keys, shift, z, x.

Gameplay: 3-6+ hours.

PG.

(Contains tracks from games I love. All copyrights belong to their respective owners. Looking for original composition moving forward!)

Pixel artists and VGM composers wanted!
